document_data.mainbody:
Goblin Hunter was a unique enchanted dagger designed specifically for hunting goblins of Icewind Dale, created by Elytharra Dinnesmore of Targos.
Goblin Hunter had a delicate pearl handle, and its blade looked more like a hunting knife than a weapon.
The blades enchantments were especially dangerous to goblins as its edge cut deeper into the creatures hides. Functionally, the dagger became a +2 enchanted weapon when wielded against goblins.
Goblin Hunter was created sometime before the , by the enchantress Elytharra Dinnesmore, the wife of Ulbrec Dinnesmore, the speaker of Targos at the time. She created the magic blade as a way to defend herself from goblin raids that menaced the settlements of Icewind Dale. When asked about Goblin Hunter, Elytharra claimed that the weapon was used only a handful of times. As of 1312 DR, the enchantress was willing to part with Goblin Hunter for the rite price.
